newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexican financial markets closed on December 12.
newsitem.headline: Mexican financial markets closed on December 12.

text.p: Mexico's financial markets are closed on Thursday for a national holiday marking Virgin of Guadalupe Day.
On Wednesday, the blue chip IPC stock market index ended 65.31 points lower, down 1.98 percent, at 3,241.75 points.
The overnight Cetes rate closed up 100 basis points at 28.50 while the 48-hour peso closed Wednesday 4.3 centavos weaker at 7.9070/7.9110 pesos per dollar.
